sentences.english: Conclusion The method provides a reliable approach to prepare the serum containing Dracaena.
sentences.chinese: 結論本法可作爲龍血竭含藥血清的製備方法。

sentences.english: The quality control standard for Resina Draconis (Longxuejie) dispersible tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了龍血竭分散片的質量標準。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the method of preparing Dragon's blood solid dispersion .
sentences.chinese: 目的確定製備龍血竭固體分散體的最佳方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of draco-treatment for the aged patients with bedsores.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察血竭粉對治療高齡褥瘡患者的療效。

sentences.english: Determination of Sanguis Draconis in Shangke Bali Powder by HPLC;
sentences.chinese: 目的用高效液相色譜法測定八釐散中血竭素的含量。

sentences.english: At present, it is mainly extracted from Dracaena draco linn.
sentences.chinese: 目前血竭的生產主要是從龍血樹中提煉而成。

sentences.english: ConclusionDragon's Blood has prominent analgesic effect and can block the nerve conduction.
sentences.chinese: 結論龍血竭具有顯著的鎮痛作用，並可阻滯神經傳導。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the efficacy of dragon's blood powder in the treatment of bed-sore at ulceration.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血竭粉治療潰瘍期褥瘡的療效。

sentences.english: Object To establish a HPLC method for determination of ethyl p hydroxybenzoate in Dragon's Blood.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定龍血竭中對羥基苯甲酸乙酯含量的方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the analgesic effect and block of nerve conduction induced by Dragon's Blood.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察龍血竭鎮痛和阻滯神經傳導的藥理效應。

definition: Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
the larva of silkworm with batrytis
peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
the root bark of the peony tree
Chinese cinnamon (Cinnamomum cassia)/also written 肉桂[rou4 gui4]
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
